div.p: We at Heartyculture Natural Products LLP take privacy of your data seriously. This policy ( "Privacy Policy ") sets out how we collect, use, store and share your data when you use our website heartyulture.com ( "Website ") and/or any future mobile application ( "App ") or mobile version of Website (collectively referred to as the "Platform "). References to "we ", "our", "us" or the "Company" shall mean the Platform. Any references to "you", "your" or "user" shall mean any person or entity, including the vendors, using our Platform. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy is a part of the User Terms of Use and Vendor Terms of Use (collectively Terms ). By using this Platform, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy and consent to our use and disclosure of data provided by you in the manner described in this Privacy Policy. The capitalized words not defined in this Privacy Policy, shall have the meaning given to such words in the Terms. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, please do not use this Platform.
We may revise this Privacy Policy, update the Platform, and change our services at any time. Please check this page from time to time to notice any changes we make, as they are binding on you.

Where We Store Your Personal Information

Our website development partner may utilize the cloud services of third party providers, which may store this data on their servers located outside of India. We ensure adequate security measures in place to protect the loss, misuse and alteration of the information, details of which are available at [please insert link]. The privacy policy adopted by Shopify are detailed in their privacy policy. In the event you have questions or concerns about the security measures adopted by Odoo, you can contact their data protection/privacy team/legal team or the designated grievance officer at their organization, whose contact details are available in their privacy policy. Alternatively, you can also write to our Grievance Officer at the address provided below.

It may kindly be noted that the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. We will do our best to protect your Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information but we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to the Platform. Any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorised access.
Your Rights

You may remove or delete your information from your user Account/profile at any point in time. You may amend, add or delete Personal Information and/or Sensitive Personal Information from your Account at any time by logging in and visiting your profile page. As noted above, you may opt out from unwanted email communications from us by following certain instructions available on the Platform. However, you will continue to receive emails until your Account is deleted.

Under Rule 5(6) of the Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011 ( "Rules "), you have a right to ask us to review, correct and amend the information we collect about you at any point in time. Under Rule 5(7) of the Rules, you also have the right to revoke your consent to the collection of your information going forward. However, please note that revoking your consent may negatively affect your use of the Platform. You may also ask us not to process your personal data for marketing purposes. You can exercise any of these rights at any time by contacting us at care@heartyculture.com However, we require a reasonable period of 15 (fifteen) days to comply with any of your requests.

We may retain the information you provide to facilitate your smooth and uninterrupted use of our Platform, for the purposes (i) to provide, improve and personalize our services; (ii) to contact you about your Account and give customer service; (iii) to personalise our advertising and marketing communications; and (iv) to prevent, detect, mitigate, and investigate fraudulent or illegal activities. We do not retain your Sensitive Personal Information for longer than required for the purpose for which the information may be lawfully used. For any other information, we will entertain your request for deletion, however, this might affect your smooth and uninterrupted use of our services on the Platform.

The Platform may contain references and links to third party websites and products in such websites. However, we are not liable in any manner, whatsoever, for any content as may be displayed on such third-party websites. If you follow a link to any of these websites, please note that these websites have their own privacy policies, terms of use and cookie policies that we do not accept any responsibility or liability for. Please check these documents before you submit any personal data to these websites, mobile applications or their own affiliates.

We may from time to time send you service-related announcements when we consider it necessary to do so (such as when we temporarily suspend the Platform for maintenance, or security, privacy, or administrative-related communications). We send these to you via SMS or/and emails. You may not opt-out of these service-related announcements, which are not promotional in nature and used solely to protect your Account and keep you informed of important changes to the Platform.
